summary: Pull request #2 in the GitHub repository faheemakhmed/algorithms-in-c is titled "Improve linked list deletion function".  It includes improvements such as input validation, a `getLength()` function, `freeList()` for memory management, better error handling, and improved display formatting.  The pull request is open, has one commit, 44 additions, 9 deletions, and affects 1 file.  The author is faheemakhmed.  The pull request's URL is https://github.com/faheemakhmed/algorithms-in-c/pull/2.
